title: Disappointed: Brendan Rodgers makes statement after Liverpool sack
text:
19:40 CET Disappointed: Brendan Rodgers makes statement after Liverpool sack 
Liverpool manager Brendan Rodgers has finally broken his silence following his sacking at the club and has thanked the supoorters and the club for all the memories. 
Brendan Rodgers statement http://t.co/nO8y3kesHS â€” Dan Roan (@danroan) 2013-07-22 14:22:09.0
